sqlMap.select:
SELECT id, confname, type, userformat, localprotect, remoteprotect, uacprotect, unboundlogin, descp FROM
(select top $pageSize$ * from otppms_agentconf where id not in
(select top $startRow$ id from otppms_agentconf order by id DESC) order by id DESC) otppms_agentconf where 1=1
ORDER BY id DESC
